views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11, and 12

WADarkMode will make dark mode for WhatsApp Messenger

I hope you like it :)

Configure option from inside WhatsApp settings.

#1.6.1 - You can now switch between the default and custom chat color. # 1.6

- Add two theme, and you can choose them from the settings
- Tweak support WhatsApp (2.18.111 to 2.19.21)
- Fix some issues
# 1.5

- Fix Crash in last version of WhatsApp 2.18.111
- Fix some Colors
# v1.4
- Fix some colors
- Support with last version of whatsapp
# v1.1-1
- Fix background status
- Fix text color in reply context
- Fix color in Stalky tweak
- Fix some colors inside app
- Fix the crash if you disable tweak
